Home > Electricans > James Wilson

Professional Summary

Licensed master electrician with over 10 years of experience in residential and light commercial electrical work. I specialize in troubleshooting electrical issues, panel upgrades, lighting installations, and smart home integrations. My work is always up to code, and I pride myself on clean, efficient service with transparent pricing.

Availability

Available Monday–Friday, 8am–6pm. Emergency services available 24/7 at premium rates.
